Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc31
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.view.gui

Class GUIApplication

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.view.gui.GUIApplication
public class GUIApplication extends javafx.application.Application
Runnable application of the GUI. Contains methods to manage the window sizes and scene load Memorize essential variables for view purposes
